sentence.Network_en: A victory for Allende would imperil our interests in the Western Hemisphere.
sentence.Network_cn: 阿连德一旦获胜,就将危及我们在西半球的利益.

sentence.Network_en: I will not imperil my soul. I will uphold the justice of the Church.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不愿使我的灵魂受到玷污, 我要维护教会法律的公正.

sentence.Network_en: Conservationists say the losses could imperil the long - term survival of the creatures.
sentence.Network_cn: 自然保护协会人士认为石油泄露将 长期 威胁海龟的生存.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语常见词根前缀后缀大全 ... imbrute 堕落，使成禽兽 imperil 危害，使处于危险 impearl 使成珍珠，饰以珍珠.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... peril 危险 imperil 使陷于危险中，危及 utensil 工具，（厨房）用具.
中级口译词汇预习笔记... ... hiv-positive hiv 阳性 imperil 威胁 homosexually transmitted disease 由同性恋传播的疾病.
英语词汇的奥秘 ... imbrute 使成禽兽一样 imperil 使处于危险 impearl 使成珍珠，饰以珍珠.

list.abs: Violence and military attacks will imperil peace ., 暴力和军事打击可能折断和平的翅膀.
A victory for Allende would imperil our interests in the Western Hemisphere ., 阿连德一旦获胜 , 就将危及我们在西半球的利益.
he goes deep into jugle , searching for such filies and venomous mosquitoes what is imperil human .他深入人从中，找寻苍蝇，毒蚊等等危害人类的东西。
Water pollution imperils all kinds of marine life ., 水质污染危及所有海洋生物.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from peril, probably on the pattern of endanger

entry.def: Something that imperils you puts you in danger.

example.ex: You imperilled the lives of other road users by your driving.
example.tran: 你的驾驶危及了其他路人的生命安全。

means.word_mean: 1. pose a threat to; present a danger to;

auth_sentence.content: Increasing sea levels imperil a large percentage of the world's population which live close to the sea.
auth_sentence.res_content: Increasing sea levels imperil a large percentage of the world's population which live close to the sea.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Increasing sea levels imperil a large percentage of the world's population which live close to the sea.

auth_sentence.content: Livestock also foul water supplies that native wildlife need and carry diseases that imperil natives.
auth_sentence.res_content: Livestock also foul water supplies that native wildlife need and carry diseases that imperil natives.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Livestock also foul water supplies that native wildlife need and carry diseases that imperil natives.

auth_sentence.content: Maybe your online persona is free of keg stands -- or photos of them don't imperil your job prospects.
auth_sentence.res_content: Maybe your online persona is free of keg stands -- or photos of them don't imperil your job prospects.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Maybe your online persona is free of keg stands -- or photos of them don't imperil your job prospects.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"向内,成为,进入,使……"; 2. 表示"不,无,非"

stems_affixes.word_buile: im向内,成为,进入,使……+passion激情+ed……的→adj.慷慨激昂的
im向内,成为,进入,使……+plic重叠+it→进入重叠→不直说→储蓄的
im不,无,非+moral道德的→adj.不道德的
im不,无,非+partial有偏见的→adj.公平的
im不,无,非+pecc斑点+able……的→无斑点的
im不,无,非+possible可能的→adj.不可能的
im向内,成为,进入,使……+migrate移居→入住
im向内,成为,进入,使……+pel推→推进,驱动
im向内,成为,进入,使……+peril危险→v.使处于危险中
im向内,成为,进入,使……+person人+ate表动词→进入别人→扮演别人
im向内,成为,进入,使……+prison监狱→v.监禁
im向内,成为,进入,使……+pulse跳动→内在推动→冲动

sentences.en: The whole project is imperilled by lack of funds.
sentences.cn: 整个工程因缺少资金而陷于危险之中。
